data.text: @Geburr22 @FFXParentsAssoc No, they didn’t. Sweden never masked their children and never made it mandatory. Their death per capita is much lower than US. TX, no mask mandate better than CA with mandates. NJ & NY, mask mandates the entire time, worst deaths per capita in the country.
@LibertyKatJG @FFXParentsAssoc Areas where mask policies were implemented have had significantly lower death totals than their peers. Masks have worked. ✌🏾✊🏾💯

@DCMockers @FFXParentsAssoc They have had a fraction of the deaths that the counties you idolize have had. So if the goal was to kill people with sickness, then yes they have been on the wrong side of things. ✌🏾✊🏾💯
@LordKnight22046 @FFXParentsAssoc Their cognitive dissonance is off the charts
@FFXParentsAssoc Bring back the law that states that masks are illegal
@clm21071988 @FFXParentsAssoc Agree! But they will be masked Monday as FCPS will drag its feet and meet w/ lawyers & unions first.
@FFXParentsAssoc They have never required anything. People just choose to blindly followed them.
@FFXParentsAssoc Timing is just a little to perfect https://t.co/LQPbUKqp0A
